sources.title: The sky obeys them
sources.description: It was entrusted to Test pilot Alexey Kolchin to the first to lift the jet plane in air and to specify to designers in its lacks. The first tests have passed successfully. But in an operating time over car improvement there was an accident, and Kolchin was lost. Now Sergey Sharov, attentively having studied the recommendations of the friend which has been written down on a recorder film, does the second attempt â¦
